full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS 'KHOR BDE STONG ROL PA'I GAR MKHAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DPAL MYUR MDZAD MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS MCHOD BDE STONG ROL PA'I GANG MKHAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG RGYAL RI KHROD CHEN NAM MKHA' DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG BO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, KHYAB BDAG GANGS RI'I MGON MCHOG GI ZHABS RDUL SPEL BAR LEN PAS, BTZUN PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS KYIS CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL MI 'GYUR LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG LEGS BSHAD GTOR DANG SBYAR BA 'DI LA MNOD PA'I MCHIS NA MKHAS RNAMS KHRIL BA MED PA ZHUGS, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
